tools.name: send_email
tools.description: Send email immediately using configured SMTP server. Use this tool when user asks to send or confirm an email. Requires SEND_EMAIL authority.

tools.name: draft_email
tools.description: Compose but do NOT send an email to a lead or client. Creates a draft for review.

_def.description: ID of the lead/client to email
Email body content in markdown format

tools.name: global_search
tools.description: Free-text search across clients, leads, invoices, sessions. Use when you need any record and don't know the specific ID.

tools.name: find_entity
tools.description: Find a person by name or email across leads and clients tables. Returns the best match with status.

_def.description: Name, email, or phone to search for

tools.name: count_invoices
tools.description: Count invoices for a specific year (defaults to current year)

_def.description: Year to count invoices for (defaults to current year)

tools.name: count_sessions
tools.description: Count photography sessions for a specific year (defaults to current year)

_def.description: Year to count sessions for (defaults to current year)

tools.name: count_leads
tools.description: Count leads for a specific year (defaults to current year)

_def.description: Year to count leads for (defaults to current year)

tools.name: create_gallery_checkout
tools.description: Create Stripe checkout for gallery print order

tools.name: submit_prodigi_order
tools.description: Submit gallery order to Prodigi for print fulfillment and dropshipping

tools.name: create_photography_session
tools.description: Create a new photography session/booking in the calendar

tools.name: read_calendar_sessions
tools.description: Retrieve photography sessions from calendar with filtering options

tools.name: update_photography_session
tools.description: Update an existing photography session (reschedule, change details, update status)

tools.name: cancel_photography_session
tools.description: Cancel or delete a photography session

tools.name: check_calendar_availability
tools.description: Check available time slots for booking new sessions

tools.name: upload_file
tools.description: Upload and organize files in the digital files system

tools.name: read_digital_files
tools.description: Retrieve digital files with filtering and search options

tools.name: update_digital_file
tools.description: Update file metadata, move between folders, or change organization

tools.name: delete_digital_file
tools.description: Delete a file from the digital files system

tools.name: organize_files_by_folder
tools.description: Get folder organization and file statistics

tools.name: create_blog_post
tools.description: Create a new blog post for the photography website

checks.message: Blog content must be at least 100 characters

tools.name: read_blog_posts
tools.description: Retrieve blog posts with filtering and search options

tools.name: update_blog_post
tools.description: Update an existing blog post (content, status, metadata)

tools.name: delete_blog_post
tools.description: Delete a blog post from the website

tools.name: publish_blog_post
tools.description: Publish a draft blog post or schedule it for future publication

tools.name: create_email_campaign
tools.description: Create a new email marketing campaign

checks.message: Email content must be at least 50 characters

tools.name: read_email_campaigns
tools.description: Retrieve email campaigns with filtering and performance metrics

tools.name: send_email_campaign
tools.description: Send an email campaign immediately or schedule it for later

tools.name: update_email_campaign
tools.description: Update an existing email campaign (only drafts can be modified)

tools.name: delete_email_campaign
tools.description: Delete an email campaign (only drafts can be deleted)

tools.name: create_questionnaire
tools.description: Create a new questionnaire for client intake, feedback, or surveys

tools.name: read_questionnaires
tools.description: Retrieve questionnaires with filtering and response statistics

tools.name: send_questionnaire
tools.description: Send a questionnaire to specific clients or target groups

tools.name: read_questionnaire_responses
tools.description: Retrieve questionnaire responses with filtering and analysis

tools.name: update_questionnaire
tools.description: Update an existing questionnaire (structure, settings, activation)

tools.name: generate_business_report
tools.description: Generate comprehensive business reports with revenue, client, and performance analytics

tools.name: get_kpi_dashboard
tools.description: Retrieve key performance indicators and dashboard metrics

tools.name: export_data_analytics
tools.description: Export analytics data for external analysis or reporting

tools.name: get_performance_metrics
tools.description: Get detailed performance metrics for business analysis

tools.name: manage_user_accounts
tools.description: Create, update, or deactivate user accounts and manage permissions

tools.name: system_configuration
tools.description: Manage system settings, preferences, and configuration options

tools.name: database_management
tools.description: Perform database maintenance, backups, and optimization tasks

tools.name: system_monitoring
tools.description: Monitor system performance, health, and generate alerts

tools.name: audit_trail
tools.description: Track and review system audit logs and user activities

tools.name: manage_integrations
tools.description: Configure and manage third-party service integrations (email, calendar, payment, storage)

tools.name: api_management
tools.description: Manage API keys, endpoints, and external service connections

tools.name: webhook_management
tools.description: Configure, test, and monitor incoming/outgoing webhooks

tools.name: data_sync
tools.description: Synchronize data between CRM and external systems (calendar, email, accounting)

tools.name: external_service_status
tools.description: Monitor the status and health of external service connections

tools.name: create_automation_workflow
tools.description: Create automated workflows for client onboarding, follow-ups, reminders, and business processes

tools.name: manage_automated_triggers
tools.description: Configure and monitor automated triggers for workflows and business events

tools.name: schedule_automated_tasks
tools.description: Schedule recurring tasks like follow-ups, reminders, reports, and maintenance

tools.name: read_automation_status
tools.description: Monitor automation execution status, performance, and logs

tools.name: update_automation_settings
tools.description: Modify automation workflow settings, schedules, and configurations

tools.name: create_portal_access
tools.description: Grant clients access to their customer portal with personalized dashboard

tools.name: manage_portal_content
tools.description: Manage client-specific portal content including galleries, documents, and messages

tools.name: read_portal_analytics
tools.description: Get analytics on client portal usage, engagement, and activity

tools.name: update_portal_settings
tools.description: Update client portal configurations, permissions, and display settings

tools.name: send_portal_notifications
tools.description: Send notifications to clients about new content, updates, or system messages

minLength.message: At least one client ID required

tools.name: reply_email
tools.description: Reply to a lead or client using a template. Finds the email automatically.

_def.description: UUID of the lead or client

tools.name: create_invoice
tools.description: Create an invoice with multiple items. Supports SKU items from price list OR custom items. Use SKUs for standard packages like 'DIGI-10' for 10 digital images.

_def.description: Single SKU code from price list
Custom service description if not using SKU
Custom amount in EUR if not using SKU

tools.name: describe_capabilities
tools.description: Get comprehensive list of all available CRM tools and their capabilities. Use this when unsure which tools to use for a complex request.

_def.description: Optional: filter by category (communication, billing, scheduling, content, files, search, crm, analytics, admin, automation, portal, products)

tools.name: kb_search
tools.description: Search studio knowledge base for domain-specific information, best practices, or documentation. Returns top 3 most relevant documents.

_def.description: Search query for knowledge base (e.g. 'invoice workflow', 'client onboarding', 'pricing strategy')

tools.name: create_voucher_product
tools.description: Create a new voucher product for sale

tools.name: sell_voucher
tools.description: Sell a voucher to a client or external buyer

tools.name: read_voucher_sales
tools.description: Read voucher sales with optional filters

tools.name: redeem_voucher
tools.description: Mark a voucher as redeemed

tools.name: list_top_clients
tools.description: Get top clients ranked by lifetime value, revenue, or other criteria

tools.name: get_client_segments
tools.description: Analyze client segments and provide segmentation insights
